title: Unable to Post
body:
It says I must be over level 7 to post, but I am. Help please?

https://imgur.com/a/rMkvP

replies.body: I used [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool). i had major issues trying to figure out how to post too, I'm like level 44 lol.
Yo that Syncing Tool is a lifesaver sometimes xD! Glad you were able to get that fixed up on your own ^_^
